meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jessica Burr Amit Kurlekar Justin Sausville Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6210.

td.p: Jessica Burr, a book editor from Bloomfield, New Jersey
Amit Kurlekar, an attorney from Oakland, California
Justin Sausville, a urologist from Baltimore, Maryland (whose 6-day cash winnings total $134,000)

tr.td: INAUGURAL ADDRESSES
THERE SHOULD BE PLAYOFFS!
WINE A LITTLE
MISSOURI LOVES COMPANY
I'M ABSOLUTELY SURE
SOUNDS KINDA "IFF"-Y

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '"At this last pres. inauguration of the 20th century, let us lift our eyes toward the challenges that await us"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: "At this last pres. inauguration of the 20th century, let us lift our eyes toward the challenges that await us"

...

tariffs

JustinJessica
Triple Stumper
')

$10,601
Hershey')

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
